string.text: Fatal Error
PDA Frying
Device Frying
Other Settings
Frequency of checking PDA for "frying" (sec.)
The time interval during a surge or psi storm after what game will try to break your PDA or Devices.
Chance for Devices to fry (%)
Chance for Devices to fry from electric damage (%)
Factor for Devices to fry from radiation (%)
Chance that Devices will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that Devices will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for Devices is 0.10, then chance for Devices to break will equal 1%.
Chance of I-st generation PDA to fry (%)
Chance of II-nd generation PDA to fry (%)
Chance of III-rd generation PDA to fry (%)
Chance of IV-th generation PDA to fry (%)
Chance of V-th generation PDA to fry (%)
Chance of I-st generation PDA to BSOD (%)
Chance of II-nd generation PDA to BSOD (%)
Chance of III-rd generation PDA to BSOD (%)
Chance of IV-th generation PDA to BSOD (%)
Chance of V-th generation PDA to BSOD (%)
Chance that I-st generation PDA will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that II-nd generation PDA will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that III-rd generation PDA will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that IV-th generation PDA will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance that V-th generation PDA will temporary break after an emission or psi storm.
Chance of I-st generation PDA to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of II-nd generation PDA to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of III-rd generation PDA to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of IV-th generation PDA to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance of V-th generation PDA to fry from electric damage (%)
Chance that the I-st generation PDA will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the II-nd generation PDA will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the III-rd generation PDA will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the IV-th generation PDA will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the V-th generation PDA will break from damage from Electras and Pulse anomalies.
Chance that the I-st generation PDA will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the II-nd generation PDA will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the III-rd generation PDA will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the IV-th generation PDA will break during an emission or psi storm.
Chance that the V-th generation PDA will break during an emission or psi storm.
Factor for I-st generation PDA to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for II-nd generation PDA to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for III-rd generation PDA to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for IV-th generation PDA to fry from radiation (%)
Factor for V-th generation PDA to fry from radiation (%)
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 1, then chance for I-st generation PDA to break will equal 10%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.75, then chance for II-nd generation PDA to break will equal 7%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.50, then chance for III-rd generation PDA to break will equal 5%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.25, then chance for IV-th generation PDA to break will equal 2%.
For example, if Accumulated Radiation is 10, and Factor for PDA is 0.10, then chance for V-th generation PDA to break will equal 1%.
Minimal Amount of Accumulated Radiation
If Accumulated Radiation is more than Minimal Amount of Accumulated Radiation, then game will try to break your PDA or Devices.
Frequency of checking for breaking from radiation (sec.)
If Accumulated Radiation is more than Minimal Amount of Accumulated Radiation, then game will try to break your PDA or Devices every this amount of seconds.
Glitch scale for PDA from radiation.
For example, 1 - a lot of glitch from minor dose of radiation, 0 - no glitch even at the centre of Reactor No. 4.
Accumulated Radiation scale
Scales how much Accumulated Radiation you get.
Accumulated Radiation lower amount
The amount of Accumulated Radiation you lose over time.
Minimal time for reboot (sec.)
The minimal time for reboot after emission or psi storm. Must be lower than Maximum time for reboot.
Maximum time for reboot (sec.)
The maximum time for reboot after emission or psi storm. Must be higher than Minimal time for reboot.
Chance for PDA to get damaged (%)
The chance for PDA to get damaged after receiving physical damage.
Chance for Head Device to get broken (%)
The chance for Head Device to get broken after receiving physical damage to the head.
Light Reboot Mode
If you have friezes or weak PC enable this option.
PDA "Beep" radius
If there are stalkers within this radius, the PDA will emit an audible signal. Works only on later PDA models.
Key to reboot PDA
Select key for rebooting PDA.
Passive glitch for PDA
Passive glitch for a PDA that will always be present.
